name: Pycho Maze 3D
description:
Explore the deeps of nightmare dungeons, fight nasty monsters and find the exit.

Collect all the keys you see, you'll need them for opening doors and clearing your way through the dungeon, so you should better look every corner to find them all. Also be be sure to take any health potion you see, they will be useful.

Be careful while fighting these monsters:

  • Specter and Ghosts:
    • They move in a straight line, wait for the moment they move in front of you to attack.
  • Dead Walker and Zombies:
    • This monsters have a long distance sight and will chase you until you kill them. Don't let them attack you from the sides or back.
  • Mage and SkullMage:
    • Enemies capable of attacking from a distance, they will try to be out of your range and hurt you with their magic. If you are with low health it would be better to not engage them in battle.

Controls: 

  • Z: Open doors and interact when near an object (doors / exit)
  • X: Attack, deals damages and push enemies if they get hit.
  • Up arrow: Move forward
  • Down arrow: Move backwards
  • Left and Right Arrows: Change the facing direction 
  • P: Pause

This is game was made for My First Game Jam Summer 2020.

Team members:https://itch.io/profile/greenleopard

It's possible that this project receive some updates in the future, any suggestion and feedback is appreciated. Thank you!!!
